markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Free Action" />command ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))  **Trigger** Your spell deals fire damage to a creature;  **Effect** You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your next turn.
